title: Casino Slots v1.9.7 - 3D PC Game
description:
LastEnd Casino Slots delivers the best 3D Vegas-style casino action for your PC. This is a nice way to try out your luck on slot machines without using real money. 

Contains 5 Slot Designs
Hot 7 slot is a 3 reel set at multiple values, VRS Slot is a 3 reel set a $1 value, LastEnd Video Blackjack is a video blackjack game that allows bets at any amount, and Lucky Farm Slot is a 6 reel set at multiple values. Each shot can be play by using the slot lever, clicking the video screen, or by hitting the spin button. The bet can be changed by using multiplier buttons, this allow you to multiply the bet from 1-10. 

Casino Slots features an online high scoreboard that allow you to compare your luck and skill against other players from around the world. The Casino also contains an high rollers area that contains $10 slots machines. 

To uses the scoreboard look for the cash out A.T.M. located in the main game room. You can also reset the money using the A.T.M. if you need more. The A.T.M. does not take real money. 



Full game. No crack needed!
